content.raw:
I should note that I used python to publish to the topic in the script and a pioneer 3 AT model to test the plugin. 

Here's the model: #!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/24/new-pioneer-3-at/diff

It seems to respond similarly to my physical robot when given the same vel_cmd, I'll chalk this up as good enough for an initial release. :)
